body:
Headcanon: Brie Larson x Fem!Reader

request:  Cuddling with Brie Larson hc

word count: 1097

A/N: hiiii let me know what you guys think!

Cuddling Brie Larson would include:

The Spoon:

  • Brie loves spooning!!
  • She loves cuddling up against you
  • Wrapping her arms around your frame
  • She loved that it allowed for full body contact  
  • Feeling every inch of you from your head to your toes
  • You guys would move together into different positions
  • Your legs tangled
  • Your fingers intertwined
  • She loves tracing figures on you
  • Like your stomach
  • Or your sides
  • Or your back
  • But her favorite was to trace your thighs
  • She knew exactly what she was doing to you when she did that
  • You’d let out a content sigh first
  • But after a while you’d start squirming underneath her
  • Her hand going higher and higher each time
  • Eventually you’d turn around and straddle her
  • A satisfied smirk on her face as you pinned her down
  • ‘Right where I want you.’ She’d chuckle
  • She’d be able to smell your hair
  • She’d get your hair in her mouth all the time
  • You’d laugh at her
  • She was mostly the big spoon but she secretly loved being the little spoon
  • She loved when you wrapped your arms around her
  • She loved when you kissed her neck or her cheek
  • Loved when you were thrashing around underneath her cause you didn’t know where to put your other arm
  • You’d have you face pressed in between her shoulder blades
  • Putting one leg over her waist
  • Your arms around her, pressing her all the way against you
  • One hand going underneath her shirt
  • You’d kiss her shoulders every now and then
  • You loved this position most post-sex
  • She’d be naked, pressed back against you
  • Your chest against her back
  • You’d both be sweaty but you didn’t care
  • Her hair displayed against the pillows, little strands of it sticking to her forehead
  • You’d fall asleep like that, sharing the body heat you created during the course of the evening

The Magic Flight:

  • This position is a lot like spooning
  • From the waist up it’s the same
  • Brie pressed against your back or the other way around
  • But from the waist down it was a little different
  • You’d have one knee raised to your stomach, the other leg straightened
  • Brie would be laying the same way
  • Her upper leg pressed against the bottom of your thigh
  • It would create much more space between you too
  • You mostly used this position if one of you couldn’t sleep
  • You’d wanna cuddle but not wake the other up so this was much easier to maintain since you could stretch your legs instead of thrashing around and keeping the other up with you

The Cradle:

  • This position wasn’t used often.
  • It was used mostly when the other had had a really bad day
  • You’d be lying on your back
  • Brie’s head in the crook of your neck
  • She’d be curled up with your legs resting over hers
  • Your arms around each other
  • It was a great position when you’d had a bad day
  • Cause you could just curl up into her and disappear
  • You just lay there listening to her heartbeat
  • Feeling her chest rise and fall with every breath she took
  • After a while she’d start whispering sweet nothings in your ear
  • ‘Do you wanna talk about it?’
  • You’d take your head out of the crook of her neck and look up at her
  • Talking to her about your awful day
  • She’d bring one hand up to brush some hair out of your face
  • Listening to you intently
  • You’d do the same for her when she’d had a bad day
  • Work would’ve been hard
  • Or she’d hear that she had to leave you for a long time
  • Maybe she was just tired
  • But she’d have her head on your chest
  • (Her favorite place besides maybe in between your thighs)
  • She’d be talking to you
  • You’d feel the vibrations of her voice against your skin
  • You’d be untangling her hair
  • Letting out quiet mmh-mmh’s to let her know you were listening
  • You’d feel a few tears hitting your skin
  • You’d reassure her
  • Tell her everything is gonna be okay
  • ‘I’m here for you.’
  • ‘It’ll get better.’
  • ‘You’re okay.’
  • She’d fall asleep in your arms and you wouldn’t have the heart to wake her
  • Even though you lost feeling in your arm like 10 minutes ago

The Twist:

  • You loved this position
  • It was one of your favorites during the winter
  • You’d be in bed
  • Curled up under three thick blankets and surrounded by pillows
  • Lying chest to chest
  • Your legs entangled so badly you didn’t know if you could ever untangle them again
  • Not that you minded
  • You could stay there forever
  • You’d be talking about the holiday season
  • What you were gonna do for Christmas
  • What you were gonna wear for Halloween
  • What presents you got for your friends/family
  • Making plans to go ice skating and pumpkin picking
  • You loved looking into her eyes while cuddling
  • It was so intimate
  • You’d fall in love with her all over again
  • She’d watch your eyelids begin to close
  • Chuckling at how cute you were
  • Kissing the tip of your nose before pulling you into her chest
  • She’d fall asleep to your soft breathing

The Independent

  • Now the way the twist was great in winter this one is great in summer
  • You’d be lying in bed
  • Blankets thrown on to the floor out of frustration
  • You’d be wearing next to nothing and you’d still be so hot
  • But you’re love sick puppies and you wanna cuddle
  • So you’d lie back to back
  • Your arm reaching out behind you to hold her
  • Soft subtle touches would have to do cause you couldn’t stand the heat
  • Sometimes you’d lie face to face
  • Both of you on opposite sides of the bed
  • Your hands meeting in the middle
  • Fingers touching slightly
  • You felt stupid but you could almost say you missed her

The Couch Twist:

  • As the name suggests this takes place on the couch
  • One of your favorite dates was to just stay at home and watch a show together
  • Order take out and drink wine
  • This happened a lot if Brie had been away for a while
  • You’d be on your back, one leg on the couch and the other one thrown over the back of the couch
  • Brie in between your legs, cuddled up to you
  • Her head resting on your chest
  • Focusing on the show
  • You’d cuddle into all hours of the night
  • Too lazy and way too comfortable to move to the bedroom
  • You’d fall asleep on the couch together
  • But not before draping a blanket over both of you

  • ‘It’ll get better.’
  • ‘You’re okay.’
  • She’d fall asleep in your arms and you wouldn’t have the heart to wake her
  • Even though you lost feeling in your arm like 10 minutes ago

The Twist:

  • You loved this position
  • It was one of your favorites during the winter
  • You’d be in bed
  • Curled up under three thick blankets and surrounded by pillows
  • Lying chest to chest
  • Your legs entangled so badly you didn’t know if you could ever untangle them again
  • Not that you minded
  • You could stay there forever
  • You’d be talking about the holiday season
  • What you were gonna do for Christmas
  • What you were gonna wear for Halloween
  • What presents you got for your friends/family
  • Making plans to go ice skating and pumpkin picking
  • You loved looking into her eyes while cuddling
  • It was so intimate
  • You’d fall in love with her all over again
  • She’d watch your eyelids begin to close
  • Chuckling at how cute you were
  • Kissing the tip of your nose before pulling you into her chest
  • She’d fall asleep to your soft breathing

The Independent

  • Now the way the twist was great in winter this one is great in summer
  • You’d be lying in bed
  • Blankets thrown on to the floor out of frustration
  • You’d be wearing next to nothing and you’d still be so hot
  • But you’re love sick puppies and you wanna cuddle
  • So you’d lie back to back
  • Your arm reaching out behind you to hold her
  • Soft subtle touches would have to do cause you couldn’t stand the heat
  • Sometimes you’d lie face to face
  • Both of you on opposite sides of the bed
  • Your hands meeting in the middle
  • Fingers touching slightly
  • You felt stupid but you could almost say you missed her

The Couch Twist:

  • As the name suggests this takes place on the couch
  • One of your favorite dates was to just stay at home and watch a show together
  • Order take out and drink wine
  • This happened a lot if Brie had been away for a while
  • You’d be on your back, one leg on the couch and the other one thrown over the back of the couch
  • Brie in between your legs, cuddled up to you
  • Her head resting on your chest
  • Focusing on the show
  • You’d cuddle into all hours of the night
  • Too lazy and way too comfortable to move to the bedroom
  • You’d fall asleep on the couch together
  • But not before draping a blanket over both of you

summary: Brie Larson's Unicorn Store Rotten Tomatoes Score is ABYSMAL
title: Brie Larson's Unicorn Store Rotten Tomatoes Score is ABYSMAL
body:
Brie Larson’s Unicorn Store Rotten Tomatoes Score is ABYSMAL

Brie Larson’s directorial debut in Unicorn Store has an absolutely abysmal Rotten Tomatoes score.

The film, which stars Samuel L. Jackson, Joan Cusack, Bradley Whitford, Martha MacIsaac, and Karan Soni, has a 58% Tomatometer score from critics. However, it has a 36% Audience Score.

The film doesn’t fare any better on MetaCritic. In fact, it has an even worse Metascore at 44. The User Score is in…

View On WordPress
